wikipedia_page.main: John Ferguson Connor (born 25 July 1934 in Maryport, Cumberland, died 6 March 2010 in Formby) was a professional footballer who played as a defender for Huddersfield Town, Bristol City and Formby before becoming a coach at Everton.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: *Jack Connor (footballer, born 1911) (1911–1994), Scottish football centre forward
*Jack Connor (footballer, born 1919) (1919–1998), English football centre forward for Stockport County
*Jack Connor (footballer, born 1934) (1934–2010), English football defender for Huddersfield Town & Bristol City
